Keyboard shortcuts for SoundCloud

A visual cheat-sheet for the 22 keyboard shortcuts found on SoundCloud

Original Reference Report Issue

General

Play or pause

  • Space

Play next track

  • Shift
  • Right

Repeat playing track

  • Shift
  • L

Play previous track

  • Shift
  • Left

Seek forward

  • Right

Like playing track

  • L

Repost playing track

  • R

Search

  • S

Navigate to likes

  • G
  • L

Navigate to library

  • G
  • C

Navigate to history

  • G
  • H

Shuffle

  • Shift
  • S

Decrease volume

  • Shift
  • Down

Increase volume

  • Shift
  • Up

Mute volume

  • M

Seek backwards

  • Left

Seek to position

  • 0-9

Navigate to playing track

  • P

Show keyboard shortcuts

  • H

Navigate to stream

  • G
  • S

Navigate to profile

  • G
  • P

Show next up

  • Q
